page.title:
Uncertainty introduced by Spectral Conversion
Uncertainty introduced by Spectral Conversion
page.normal_text:
• Uncertainty Analysis shows these map into systematic uncertainties of biases estimated from GSICS Correction evaluated for Standard Radiance scenes with similar order of magnitudes • Dominate the error budget for 3.9μm and WV channels • Need more sophisticated definition of SRFs to reduce errors
